name: Project Foxtrot: Proof of Concept
description:
This is the proof of concept for a project I made in 2018.  The idea was to see if I actually could code some very basic things like character movement and more complicated "behind the scenes" stuff.

All of the assets were created by me with the exception of the placeholder music. I haven't continued development on this version since early 2018 and  have since shifted focus to the development of my pixel art style.  I do not plan to return to it but instead rebuild it from the ground up in a new engine.

Currently only runs on Windows

Movement: WASD

Dash: space

Sneak: Shift
